MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G52 postcode area of Glasgow, affecting properties in Penilee Terrace and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9:25pm. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers have arrived at the local substation to investigate a possible blown fuse. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:30am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:26pm on  Tuesday, 16 February 2021
